results.title: Choice of antihypertensive agent in isolated systolic hypertension and isolated diastolic hypertension: A secondary analysis of the ALLHAT trial.
results.text_hl: We compared the use of @CHEMICAL_Chlorthalidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002752 @@@chlorthalidone@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, or @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on the primary outcome of combined @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@, @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@, or all-cause mortality in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with isolated @DISEASE_Isolated_Systolic_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000092244 @@@systolic hypertension@@@ or isolated @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Diastolic_Resistance_to</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563897 @@@diastolic hypertension@@@.

results.title: Evaluation of long-term efficacy and acceptability of indapamide SR in elderly hypertensive patients.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Over the course of the long-term, 12-month follow-up study, @CHEMICAL_Indapamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007190 @@@indapamide@@@ SR was shown to be an effective and well tolerated antihypertensive therapy, even after a switch from @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ aged 65 years-80 years with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Diastolic_Resistance_to</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563897 @@@systolo-diastolic hypertension@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Hypertension_Diastolic_Resistance_to</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C563897 @@@SDH@@@) or ISH.

citations.NLM: Leonetti G, Emeriau JP, Knauf H, Pujadas JO, Calvo-Gomez C, Abate G, European Study Investigators. Evaluation of long-term efficacy and acceptability of indapamide SR in elderly hypertensive patients. Curr Med Res Opin. 2005 Jan;21(1):37-46. PMID: 15881474
